name: Chaotic Wizard
description:
In this game you become chaotic and clumsy wizard who mixes his spells at every occasion.

(Maximize)

Controls:

WSAD - Movement

Mouse - Aiming and Shooting

1,2,3,4 - Spell selection

Game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Programing - sledzik089

Art - sledzik089

Sfx - sledzik089

Dont know why but the game sometimes softlocks, restarting the page seams to fix it

Hope you had fun and thank you for playing!
